entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: The sorting hat suggests that Harry could be great and that Slytherin will help him on his way to greatness. The hat also shouts 'Gryffindor' when it decides where Harry should sit.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The sorting hat suggests that Harry could be great and that Gryffindor will help him on his way to greatness. The hat shouts 'Gryffindor' when it decides where Harry should sit.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story and is being sorted into a house by the sorting hat.

entities.name: percy the prefect
entities.description: Percy is a prefect who shakes Harry's hand when he is sorted into Gryffindor.

entities.name: weasley twins
entities.description: The Weasley twins yell 'We got Potter!' when Harry is sorted into Gryffindor.

entities.name: high table
entities.description: Harry can see the High Table properly now that he has been sorted into a house.
